definition: of your own free will or design, composition (often improvised) for a solo instrument (especially solo organ) and not a regular part of a religious service or musical performance
details:
adjective
- of your own free will or design
- controlled by individual volition
= example: controlled by individual volition
noun
- composition (often improvised) for a solo instrument (especially solo organ) and not a regular part of a religious service or musical performance
- (military) a person who freely enlists for service
= synonyms: volunteer, military volunteer
